name: Before Venturing Forth
description:
Before Venturing Forth is a puzzle game about escaping a dungeon with as many adventurers as you can! It's only a small game and it doesn't have much depth, but there's an idea being explored that you might find fun! Here's how it works:

  • Use the arrow keys to move all your adventurers at once.
  • Skeletons hunt down things they can see (in straight lines only).
  • Skeletons attack things standing next to them.
  • Each level is complete when all living adventurers are on exit tiles.

I hope you enjoy it! Let me know what you think, particularly if you have any comments about the puzzle design. You can leave comments here, or send me a tweet.
